name: Deers & Drones
description:
WASD/Arrows/Joystick to move | Space/A to trigger drone alarm 

Every year deer fawn are hurt or even die due to harvesters moving grass and fields. This is due to deer leaving their fawn hidden in grass  when they go foraging and them being too scared of the loud noises of the machines.

In order to save the fawn a method has been developed to scare them away with drones before the harvesters arrive and projects to do so are even sponsored by the German government (German source)!

Goal: Find all the fawn and scare them off-screen.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 52 "Harvest" Game Jam and is meant to show that concept. Unfortunately not all ideas got finished in the time of the Jam :S
